header.para: Preparations for Machine InstallationCopy from V320I-I2E-XA pg 36

body.para: Perform the following preparations to ensure that all installation conditions are satisfied prior to machine installation. For details, refer to the respective section in this chapter.
Check each item in the table below, after confirming each preparation has been completed.

table.style: width:100%; cell-padding:0px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.text: Preparation of Fixtures and Hoisting Attachments

body.para: For installation procedures and instructions, refer to the respective chapters in the Installation Manual.
